item.title: Prometheus Operator support an auth proxy for Service Discovery
item.description: For ackalctld to be deployable to Kubernetes with Prometheus Operator, it is necessary to Enable ScrapeConfig to use (discovery|target) proxies #5966. While I’m familiar with Kubernetes, Kubernetes operators (Ackal uses one built with the Operator SDK) and Prometheus Operator, I’m unfamiliar with developing Prometheus Operator. This (and subsequent) posts will document some preliminary work on this. Cloned Prometheus Operator Branched scrape-config-url-proxy I’m unsure how to effect these changes and unsure whether documentation exists.
